name: Extreme Motor Bike Ride simulator 3D – Steer the moto wheel & show some extreme stunts
name_original: Extreme Motor Bike Ride simulator 3D – Steer the moto wheel & show some extreme stunts
description:
Drive bike in open world map with race challenges & bike park missions. Extreme motorbike racing simulator is superb 3D game where you play as motocross rider and control a super-fast motorbike. Show some biker skills with this super motorbike simulator game. You have to drive bike across challenging tracks through city streets, highways and traffic packed roads.

Motorbike driving is dream and passion for all roadies and biker boys as they love bike ride on freeway. Drive bike on really fast speed as pro biker and break the speed records. You really need to take extremely sharp turns to pass city environment driving challenge. Drive motorbike and get unlimited fun and excitement with its challenging game play. If you like extreme speeds racing game with powerful engine sounds then you will love this awesome bike rider stunts & racing game.

Features

15 extreme challenging missions to race across city
Stunning racer bike to drive in open world environment
Drive offroad or on highway as you desires
Real motor bike stunts, physics and animations
Superb game sounds with amazing background music
HD graphics for city environment to enhance your gaming experience
